segments.text: I see the boy stretching so far, like he’s about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and he’s just reaching for more cookies like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister standing there, watching him like he’s doing something amazing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s balancing, it’s like he doesn’t even care about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to pull the whole shelf down on top of himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in his hand is ready to catch more cookies, like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar almost empty, and he’s still going for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s standing, it’s like he’s defying gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he even realizes how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s just laughing like it’s a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t break anything when he finally loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
